Calling: Eldamon Battler.name: Calling: Eldamon Battler
Calling: Eldamon Battler.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.QZgXHHRPN7XqpSvR]{Eldamon Battler}

All of your eldamon increase their maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level (minimum 2).

Note: Place this effect on each of your Eldamon actors

Effect: Charybdis (Low Tide).description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC as long as the maelstrom lasts.
Effect: Charybdis (Low Tide).name: Effect: Charybdis (Low Tide)

Effect: Confounding Force.name: Effect: Confounding Force
Effect: Confounding Force.description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty on your next damage roll. This increases to a –4 circumstance penalty if the source is an expert in power DCs, –6 if master in power DCs, and –8 if legendary in power DCs.

Effect: Curl Up.name: Effect: Curl Up
Effect: Curl Up.description:
You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC (or increase your standard cover to greater cover if you already have standard cover) and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, can't make unarmed attacks, and can't use powers except reaction powers.

A creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike while you're curled up takes @Damage[(1+(floor(@actor.level/4)))[piercing]] damage, plus 1 additional piercing damage for every 4 levels you have beyond 1st, to a maximum of 5 damage at 19th level, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save against your power DC.

Effect: Eldamon Coordinator.name: Effect: Eldamon Coordinator
Effect: Eldamon Coordinator.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.8OeYqmt1qfSiygVa]{Eldamon Coordinator}

You can use Performance to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform} or stage a performance by showing off your eldamon. When you do, your eldamon serve just as well as the finest musical instruments. If you have the advanced training class feature, you gain a +1 item bonus on your Performance checks when using your eldamon in this way, and the bonus increases to +2 if you have the eldamon evolution class feature and +3 if you have the eldamon monster class feature. You share this item bonus with your eldamon.

Note: Place this effect on your Eldamon actors

Effect: Elemental Apotheosis.name: Effect: Elemental Apotheosis
Effect: Elemental Apotheosis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.E9IcyrxCQRZcI9bJ]{Elemental Apotheosis}

You draw upon the full elemental potential of the eldamon within you, reforging yourself into a powerful composite being far greater than the sum of your parts. While within the throes of your elemental apotheosis, elemental energies swirl around you, your eyes glow with a color associated with your element, and other visual features of the transformation make your overflowing elemental energy abundantly clear to everyone around you. This apotheosis lasts for 1 minute, during which time you gain a +4 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws, as well as 40 temporary Hit Points. When the apotheosis ends, your body must recover from the shock of overloading yourself with elemental energy. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and you take a -2 penalty to your power attack rolls and power DCs; both effects end after you rest for 10 minutes to give your body time to recover.

Effect: Entangling Vines (Failure).name: Effect: Entangling Vines (Failure)
Effect: Entangling Vines (Failure).description: The creature takes a –20-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds or until it Escapes against your power DC, whichever comes first.

Effect: Flowing River (Low Tide).description: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speeds until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Flowing River (Low Tide).name: Effect: Flowing River (Low Tide)

Effect: Force Missile Fusillade (Miss).name: Effect: Force Missile Fusillade (Miss)
Effect: Force Missile Fusillade (Miss).description:
The force missiles may have missed you, but they are circling around to have another go!

Make a @Check[type:eldamon|defense:ac]{power attack roll}

Critical Success Your missiles critically hit the target, dealing double damage.

Success Your missiles hit the target, dealing [[/r (@item.badge.value)d6[force]]] damage.

Failure Some of the missiles hit, and the others circle around to try again. Half of the missiles you directed at the target hit (rounded down), dealing [[/r (floor(@item.badge.value /2))d6[force]]]. At the beginning of each of your turns until you refresh, attempt another attack roll against the creature with the remaining missiles.

Critical Failure As failure, except all the missiles miss and circle around to try again.

Effect: Force Shield.name: Effect: Force Shield
Effect: Force Shield.description:
You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC until the end of the triggering creature's turn.

If the triggering creature's attack roll critically fails against you while the force shield is active, you can choose another target other than the attacker that's adjacent to you and within reach (for a melee attack) or range (for a ranged attack); the attacker rerolls their attack roll against the new target and applies the effects of the new roll.

Effect: Gather Pollen.description: The target takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, Perception checks, and skill checks for 1 round
Effect: Gather Pollen.name: Effect: Gather Pollen

Effect: Harden.name: Effect: Harden
Effect: Harden.description: You gain resistance equal to 5 plus your level to physical damage (except adamantine) against the triggering attack.

Effect: Harvest Shield.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the attack roll and until the beginning of your next turn. You additionally gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage equal to your level against the triggering attack.
Effect: Harvest Shield.name: Effect: Harvest Shield

Effect: Healing Mote.name: Effect: Healing Mote
Effect: Healing Mote.description: When a living creature with a mote takes damage, they receive an amount of simultaneous healing equal to 2 plus twice your level, up to a maximum of the damage taken, as normal for a recovery effect.

Effect: Heart of Darkness.name: Effect: Heart of Darkness
Effect: Heart of Darkness.description: You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} and gain a +1 status bonus on all saving throws and skill checks, which both last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ice Armor.name: Effect: Ice Armor
Effect: Ice Armor.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and temporary Hit Points equal to your level

Effect: Illuminate Weakness.name: Effect: Illuminate Weakness
Effect: Illuminate Weakness.description: A light eldamon or elemental avatar and their allies add 2 additional precision damage with their Strikes against the target as long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}, and they add 4 additional precision damage with their light powers against the target. At 11th level, the precision damage increases to 3 for Strikes and 6 for light powers, at 15th level, it increases to 4 for Strikes and 8 for light powers, and at 19th level it increases to 5 for Strikes and 10 for light powers.

Effect: Incandescent Guardian.name: Effect: Incandescent Guardian
Effect: Incandescent Guardian.description: As long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}, you and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against this foe.

Effect: Inexorable Demise.description: Three ominous skulls appear over the head of a creature you choose within 60 feet. At the end of each of the creature’s turns, a mournful bell  tolls as one of the skulls burns up and disappears.
Effect: Inexorable Demise.name: Effect: Inexorable Demise

Effect: Intrusive Analysis.name: Effect: Intrusive Analysis
Effect: Intrusive Analysis.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and saves against the foe.

Effect: Leviathan (High Tide).name: Effect: Leviathan (High Tide)
Effect: Leviathan (High Tide).description: You take a –2 penalty to your Will saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Leviathan (Low Tide).name: Effect: Leviathan (Low Tide)
Effect: Leviathan (Low Tide).description: You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Life Buffer.name: Effect: Life Buffer
Effect: Life Buffer.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.6xep3uGlHDZcmO7J]{Life Buffer}

You gain 1d10 temporary Hit Points plus an additional 1d10 temporary Hit Points for each level the origin has.

Effect: Life Cocoon.name: Effect: Life Cocoon
Effect: Life Cocoon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.ozMb4QgqbPJAGEMG]{Life Cocoon}

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and gain temporary Hit Points equal to 3 plus three times your level.

Effect: Life Conductor.name: Effect: Life Conductor
Effect: Life Conductor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.9Q6Ufd1S3At1Z9Is]{Life Conductor}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Lifebond Primary.name: Effect: Lifebond Primary
Effect: Lifebond Primary.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.

Effect: Mind Palace.name: Effect: Mind Palace
Effect: Mind Palace.description: For 1 round, you and all allies within a 20-foot radius emanation gain a +2 status bonus all Will saves

Effect: Piercing Spike Fragment.name: Effect: Piercing Spike Fragment
Effect: Piercing Spike Fragment.description: You take a –2 status penalty on their next attack roll (or all attack rolls for one round) unless you or an ally spends an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to remove the fragment.

Effect: Predict Assaults.name: Effect: Predict Assaults
Effect: Predict Assaults.description: Until the next time you Refresh, for each of those foes, you either roll twice and take the higher result on your first Reflex save against the foe or the foe rolls twice and takes the lower result on its first attack roll against you, whichever of the two comes first for that foe. If you roll twice and take the higher result, it’s a fortune effect, and if you force the foe to roll twice and take the lower results, it’s a misfortune effect.

Effect: Raging Cycle.name: Effect: Raging Cycle
Effect: Raging Cycle.description: After using a high tide power, you take a –1 penalty to your AC for 1 round. After using a low tide power, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Rainbow Banner.name: Effect: Rainbow Banner
Effect: Rainbow Banner.description: Allies within 30 feet who can see the banner gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Reap Lives.name: Effect: Reap Lives
Effect: Reap Lives.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn

Effect: Red String of Fate.name: Effect: Red String of Fate
Effect: Red String of Fate.description: Foes Grabbed by your scarf take a –1 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against your death powers.

Effect: Retributive Mindlink.description: The foe takes a circumstance penalty to its Will saves against your mind powers for 1 round. During that time, it also gain weakness equal to 1 plus half your level to mental damage from your first mental power that damages it. After taking the additional damage from the weakness once, the weakness ends.
Effect: Retributive Mindlink.name: Effect: Retributive Mindlink

Effect: Rock Shield.name: Effect: Rock Shield
Effect: Rock Shield.description: You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering  attack roll. After the triggering attack roll, this AC bonus reduces by 1; it  lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until it reduces to 0,  whichever comes first.

Effect: Rock and Roll.name: Effect: Rock and Roll
Effect: Rock and Roll.description: Your movement as a giant boulder triggers reactions as normal, but you have a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and Hardness equal to twice your level against such reactions while you’re a boulder.

Effect: Rushing Current (High Tide).name: Effect: Rushing Current (High Tide)
Effect: Rushing Current (High Tide).description: You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Shadow Betrayal.description: The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as the shadow restricts their movement.
Effect: Shadow Betrayal.name: Effect: Shadow Betrayal

Effect: Shiny Eldamon.name: Effect: Shiny Eldamon
Effect: Shiny Eldamon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.xTTxj8V6gPPwninm]{Shiny Eldamon}

While they are sharing your phase, your eldamon glow with a specific color that represents your inner spirit. Decide the color based on your personality. The eldamons' glow illuminates the area around them like a torch (20 feet of bright light and another 20 feet of dim light). When you or your eldamon Phase Eldamon, you can choose for your eldamon not to glow, and darkness eldamon never glow. If the eldamon already glows (such as most fire and light eldamon), if you choose to add the glow from this feat, the area of their bright light and dim light each expand by 20 feet.

Note: Place this effect on your Eldamon actors

Effect: Soothing Recovery.description: You gain temporary hit points equal to the origin's level. If you roll a success on an ongoing saving throw against a poison or disease, they get a critical success instead.
Effect: Soothing Recovery.name: Effect: Soothing Recovery

Effect: Stone Shell.name: Effect: Stone Shell
Effect: Stone Shell.description: You gain resistance 7 against all physical damage (except adamantine). Whenever this resistance prevents damage, it decreases by 1. The resistance lasts until you refresh or until it decreases to 0, whichever comes first.

Effect: Toughness Training.name: Effect: Toughness Training
Effect: Toughness Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.2wb309hNRajdO9E8]{Toughness Training}

While phased in eldamon can be ephemeral in our reality, you train your eldamon friends to be especially tough, even compared to other eldamon battlers. All your trained eldamon increase their maximum Hit Points by their level. This is cumulative with the benefits of the eldamon battler calling.

Note: Place this effect on each of your Eldamon actors

Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead Crit.name: Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead Critical Failure))
Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead Crit.description: On a critical failure, they take a –2 status penalty on all Fortitude saving throws for 1 round

Effect: Vine Infestation.name: Effect: Vine Infestation
Effect: Vine Infestation.description: While the persistent damage lasts the foe takes a circumstance penalty to their Speeds depending on the result of their saving throw; a –5-foot circumstance penalty on a success, a –10-foot circumstance penalty on a failure, and a –20 foot circumstance penalty on a critical failure.

Illuminated Weakness.description: During that time, you and your allies add 2 additional precision damage with your Strikes against the target as long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}, and you add 4 additional precision damage with your light powers against the target. At 11th level, the precision damage increases to 3 for Strikes and 6 for your light powers, at 15th level, it increases to 4 for Strikes and 8 for your light powers, and at 19th level it increases to 5 for Strikes and 10 for your light powers.
Illuminated Weakness.name: Illuminated Weakness

Incandescent Guardian Helper.name: Incandescent Guardian Helper
Incandescent Guardian Helper.description: As long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}, you and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the foe.

Mitigated Weakness (Eldamon).name: Mitigated Weakness (Eldamon)
Mitigated Weakness (Eldamon).description:
You train your eldamon friends to mitigate their natural eldamon weaknesses, protecting them against the elements that normally do them the most harm. Your eldamon decrease their natural eldamon weaknesses based on their element from an amount equal to their level to an amount equal to half their level.

Note: Place this feature on each of your eldamon

Water Barrier Helper.name: Water Barrier Helper
Water Barrier Helper.description: Until the beginning of your next turn, enemies using bludgeoning and slashing attacks take a –2 circumstance penalty against you and you gain resistance equal to your level to acid and fire damage.

Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone (Lingeri.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Fortitude saves, as well as resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your level, which last until either the first time the aegis's benefits apply or until you refresh, whichever comes first.
Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone (Lingeri.name: Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone (Lingering)

Effect: Aqua Punch.name: Effect: Aqua Punch
Effect: Aqua Punch.description: On success, the target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls against you for 1 round, and on a critical success, they take a –2 circumstance penalty instead.

Effect: Auto-Petrification.name: Effect: Auto-Petrification
Effect: Auto-Petrification.description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} until the beginning of your next turn, except that your Hardness is equal to four times your level, instead of the ordinary Hardness of 8.

Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone.name: Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone
Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone.description: Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Fortitude saves, as well as resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to four times your level.

Effect: Avatar Form.name: Effect: Avatar Form
Effect: Avatar Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.y59ZQTkmGgpxyIpS]{Avatar Form}

You infuse your body with the features of the eldamon residing within your soul, and at the same time, you increase your size with pure elemental energy, transforming you into an enormous hybrid between your original form and the eldamon you embody. You grow to Large size, if your size is normally smaller than Large, and your reach increases to 10 feet if it's normally less than 10 feet. Your Large form is still roughly humanoid in shape but bears distinctive features paralleling the eldamon within you, such as gaining ears, a squirrel face, or a bushy flaming tail if the eldamon within you is a squirrelash. This transformation lasts until you use Avatar Form again to return to your usual form.

Effect: Boulder Smash.name: Effect: Boulder Smash
Effect: Boulder Smash.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Brainstorm.name: Effect: Brainstorm
Effect: Brainstorm.description: If you’re in the area when a foe becomes stupefied, you steal their ideas and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves, Perception checks, power attack rolls with mind powers, and skill checks based on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Breathtaker.name: Effect: Breathtaker
Effect: Breathtaker.description:
When your death power kills a foe, you’re energized by their dying breath. You gain a +1 status bonus on Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

If you use Reap Lives on that foe while benefiting for this bonus, or if you kill a creature with Reap Lives, the status bonus increases to +2.

Effect: Bubble Burst (High Tide).name: Effect: Bubble Burst (High Tide)
Effect: Bubble Burst (High Tide).description: You take a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn

Effect: Bubble Burst (Low Tide).name: Effect: Bubble Burst (Low  Tide)
Effect: Bubble Burst (Low Tide).description: Foes in the area take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn unless they critically succeed at their saving throw.

Effect: Bubble Swarm.description: The bubbles gather around you, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Bubble Swarm.name: Effect: Bubble Swarm

Effect: Caduceus Flow.name: Effect: Caduceus Flow
Effect: Caduceus Flow.description: You gain 1 temporary Hit Point. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you're an expert in power DC, 3 temporary Hit Points if you're a master in power DC, and 4 temporary Hit Points if you're legendary in power DC.

Effect: Deteriorating Stream (Success).name: Effect: Deteriorating Stream (Success)
Effect: Deteriorating Stream (Success).description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to saving throws and AC until the beginning of their next turn.

Effect: Elemental Apotheosis (Overload).name: Effect: Elemental Apotheosis (Overload)
Effect: Elemental Apotheosis (Overload).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.E9IcyrxCQRZcI9bJ]{Elemental Apotheosis}

You draw upon the full elemental potential of the eldamon within you, reforging yourself into a powerful composite being far greater than the sum of your parts. While within the throes of your elemental apotheosis, elemental energies swirl around you, your eyes glow with a color associated with your element, and other visual features of the transformation make your overflowing elemental energy abundantly clear to everyone around you. This apotheosis lasts for 1 minute, during which time you gain a +4 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws, as well as 40 temporary Hit Points. When the apotheosis ends, your body must recover from the shock of overloading yourself with elemental energy. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and you take a -2 penalty to your power attack rolls and power DCs; both effects end after you rest for 10 minutes to give your body time to recover.

Effect: Elemental Steps.name: Effect: Elemental Steps
Effect: Elemental Steps.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.6sAJu5oEkHWPdbwm]{Elemental Steps}

All your trained eldamon increase their Speeds by 5 feet. Additionally, they can Step into difficult terrain.

Note: Place this effect on each of your Eldamon actors

Effect: Elysium.name: Effect: Elysium
Effect: Elysium.description: A creature who recovers Hit Points from Elysium gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks until their next turn.

Effect: Elemental Shield.name: Effect: Elemental Shield
Effect: Elemental Shield.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn from the elemental shield. You also gain the elemental shield benefit based on your element.

Effect: Entangling Vines.name: Effect: Entangling Vines
Effect: Entangling Vines.description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds or until it Escapes against your power DC, whichever comes first.

Effect: Entrench.name: Effect: Entrench
Effect: Entrench.description: You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and gain a +4 status bonus to saving throws and DCs against effects that attempt to move you, and Entrench attempts a counteract check against those effects with a counteract modifier equal to your power DC – 10 and a counteract level equal to half your level rounded up.

Effect: Evolved Colossus.name: Effect: Evolved Colossus
Effect: Evolved Colossus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.GR4InrRFnSLyXjcW]{Evolved Colossus}

You've helped your evolved eldamon learn how to reach truly preposterous sizes. When you or your eldamon use Phase Eldamon to phase in an eldamon in their evolved battle form, you can choose to phase them into a Gargantuan evolved battle form instead of their evolved battle form's normal size. When you do, your eldamon has a reach of 20 feet (unless its reach is normally greater). If the evolved battle form was normally Huge, your eldamon has a reach of 25 feet in the Gargantuan battle form instead (unless its reach is normally greater).

Note: Place this effect on your Eldamon actors

Effect: Evolved Giant.name: Effect: Evolved Giant
Effect: Evolved Giant.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.feats.Item.OW9fmZpU6F8yIoSd]{Evolved Giant}

You've trained with your eldamon in order to increase the size of their evolved forms. When you or your eldamon use Phase Eldamon to phase in an eldamon in their evolved battle form, you can choose to phase them into a Huge battle form instead of their evolved battle form's normal size, and if your eldamon's evolved battle form is normally Huge, you can choose to have it become Gargantuan instead. When you choose to make your eldamon's evolved battle form larger, the eldamon has a reach of 15 feet (unless its reach is normally greater).

Note: Place this effect on your Eldamon actors

Effect: Exploding Bulwark.name: Effect: Exploding Bulwark
Effect: Exploding Bulwark.description: You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC from the rock bulwark until the beginning of your next turn, upon which the bulwark explodes, sending out countless stones that veer off to seek out and pummel any of the chosen foes.

Effect: Flamewrack (Success).name: Effect: Flamewrack (Success)
Effect: Flamewrack (Success).description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to saving throws and AC until they spend a single action to remove the penalty.

Effect: Ice Shield.name: Effect: Ice Shield
Effect: Ice Shield.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the attack roll and until the end of the current creature's turn, and you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last until the end of the current creature's turn.

Effect: Mental Assistance.name: Effect: Mental Assistance
Effect: Mental Assistance.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.

Effect: Moment of Contemplation.name: Effect: Moment of Contemplation
Effect: Moment of Contemplation.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves. If you use Mind Palace, you gain a +4 status bonus instead.

Effect: Mirror's Reflections.name: Effect: Mirror's Reflections
Effect: Mirror's Reflections.description:
Three images of you formed out of light swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on [[/r 1d4]]). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1–2 on [[/r 1d6]]). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1–3 on [[/r 1d6]]).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn’t critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, or when you Refresh, the power’s effect ends.

Effect: Muninn.name: Effect: Muninn
Effect: Muninn.description: Allies within a 15-foot emanation of the ravens gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks while they are in the area as the ravens assist them.

Effect: Ocean Torrent (High Tide).name: Effect: Ocean Torrent (High Tide)
Effect: Ocean Torrent (High Tide).description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ocean Torrent (Low Tide).name: Effect: Ocean Torrent (Low Tide)
Effect: Ocean Torrent (Low Tide).description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Pallid Frostbite.name: Effect: Pallid Frostbite
Effect: Pallid Frostbite.description: You give a creature frostbite, making its frozen body brittle and easily harmed by physical attacks.

Effect: Peaceful Impulse.name: Effect: Peaceful Impulse
Effect: Peaceful Impulse.description: The foe takes mental damage equal to 1 plus your level each time they take a hostile action and takes a –1 circumstance penalty (or -2 on a critical failure) to their attack rolls, skill checks, and DCs used to perform hostile actions.

Effect: Rainbow Light.name: Effect: Rainbow Light
Effect: Rainbow Light.description:
When you deal damage with your light powers, instead of dealing fire damage, roll [[/r 1d8]]. On a:

1 the light is red and your power deals fire damage
2 the light is orange and your power deals acid damage
3 the light is yellow and your power deals electricity damage
4 the light is green and your power deals poison damage
5 the light is blue and your power deals sonic damage
6 the light is indigo and your power deals mental damage
7 the light is violet and your power deals force damage
8 you choose one of the 7 colors and damage types.

If your power deals damage over time, you still only roll once to determine the color of the light and deal that damage type for the duration of the power.

Effect: Retreat Into Pot.name: Effect: Retreat Into Pot
Effect: Retreat Into Pot.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Effect: Retreat Into Shell.name: Effect: Retreat Into Shell
Effect: Retreat Into Shell.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Effect: Rushing Current (Low Tide).name: Effect: Rushing Current (Low Tide)
Effect: Rushing Current (Low Tide).description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Sea Spray (Low Tide).name: Effect: Sea Spray (Low Tide)
Effect: Sea Spray (Low Tide).description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn, which increases to a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against creatures that didn't critically succeed on their saving throw against the Sea Spray, and a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against creatures that critically failed their saving throw against the Sea Spray.

Effect: Storm Surge (High Tide).name: Effect: Storm Surge (High Tide)
Effect: Storm Surge (High Tide).description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Storm Surge (Low Tide).name: Effect: Storm Surge (Low Tide)
Effect: Storm Surge (Low Tide).description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Undying Flame.name: Effect: Undying Flame
Effect: Undying Flame.description: The flat check DCs for the persistent fire damage from your elemental powers increase from DC 15 to DC 16, or from DC 10 to DC 12 after especially effective assistance.

Effect: Unrelenting Jet (High Tide).name: Effect: Unrelenting Jet (High Tide)
Effect: Unrelenting Jet (High Tide).description: You take a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Unrelenting Jet (Low Tide).name: Effect: Unrelenting Jet (Low Tide)
Effect: Unrelenting Jet (Low Tide).description: The target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn unless they critically succeed at their saving throw.

Effect: Vengeful Backlash.name: Effect: Vengeful Backlash
Effect: Vengeful Backlash.description: Until the beginning of your next turn (or until you are no longer standing on a solid surface, whichever comes first), all creatures that hit you with melee Strikes take bludgeoning damage from Vengeful Backlash equal to the result of their damage roll, before doubling the damage for a critical hit or adjusting for resistance, weakness, or the like. While this effect lasts, you can choose to give yourself a circumstance penalty to AC against your foes’ attacks, up to a maximum penalty of –4, in order to take more hits; you can select the penalty separately against each attack.

Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Living).name: Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Living)
Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Living).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.a7qZ46X8yHC1Gt2d]{Vibrant Inoculation}.

You gain 1d4 temporary Hit Points plus 1d4 temporary Hit Points for every level the origin has and gain a +2 status bonus on all Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead).name: Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead)
Effect: Vibrant Inoculation (Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.a7qZ46X8yHC1Gt2d]{Vibrant Inoculation}.

You take a –1 status penalty on all Fortitude saving throws. On a critical failure this penalty is –2.

Effect: Vital Breath.name: Effect: Vital Breath
Effect: Vital Breath.description: You gain 1d4 temporary Hit Points plus 1d4 temporary Hit Points for every level the origin has and gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Vital Rest.name: Effect: Vital Rest
Effect: Vital Rest.description: When you take a break, you surge with vital energy. During an encounter, if you don't act for a full round (usually because of a condition such as stunned or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, or because you Delayed for an entire round until your original initiative came again), you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 2 plus your level, which last for 2 rounds.

Effect: Vital Singularity.name: Effect: Vital Singularity
Effect: Vital Singularity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.powers.Item.mDZPll8XXrmQUSGX]{Vital Singularity}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.

Effect: Vital Touch (Living).name: Effect: Vital Touch (Living)
Effect: Vital Touch (Living).description: A living target gains 6 temporary Hit Points plus 6 temporary Hit Points per level you have.

Effect: Vital Touch (Undead).name: Effect: Vital Touch (Undead)
Effect: Vital Touch (Undead).description: The undead a –1 status penalty to AC. On a success this penalty is –2.

Effect: Vital Touch (AC bonus).name: Effect: Vital Touch (AC bonus)
Effect: Vital Touch (AC bonus).description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Vital Touch (Undead, Critical Su.name: Effect: Vital Touch (Undead, Critical Success)
Effect: Vital Touch (Undead, Critical Su.description: The undead a –2 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Water Barrier.name: Effect: Water Barrier
Effect: Water Barrier.description: Until the beginning of your next turn, enemies using bludgeoning and slashing attacks take a –2 circumstance penalty against you and you gain resistance equal to your level to acid and fire damage.

Effect: Wind Barrier.name: Effect: Wind Barrier
Effect: Wind Barrier.description: For 1 round, physical ranged attack against you or an ally within a 30-foot emanation take a circumstance penalty depending on the size of the ranged weapon. Attacks that use arrows, bolts, bullets, or similar ammunition take a –4 circumstance penalty, attacks with bigger ranged  weapons, such as javelins, take a –2 circumstance penalty. Massive ranged weapons and spell effects that don't rely on physical objects pass  through the winds with no penalty.

Effect: Yggdrasil.name: Effect: Yggdrasil
Effect: Yggdrasil.description: Allies in the area where the petals are falling gain a +2 status bonus to AC and all saving throws.

Effect: You Can Do It!.name: Effect: You Can Do It!
Effect: You Can Do It!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.actions.Item.JRM2xldo9FdB1NDT]{You Can Do It!}

Even though you're phased out, you call out encouraging messages to your eldamon friend, assisting them in their next endeavor. On a success, your eldamon gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll or skill check before the end of this turn. On a critical success, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus instead. You can use this action even though you normally can't act while phased out.

Note: Place this effect on your Eldamon actors

Enhanced Resistance (Eldamon).name: Enhanced Resistance (Eldamon)
Enhanced Resistance (Eldamon).description:
You train your eldamon friends to enhance their natural eldamon resistances, making it harder to overload them with their own element or overcome them with an elemental they already resist. Your eldamon increase their natural eldamon resistances based on their element from an amount equal to their level to an amount equal to one and a half times their level, starting at resistance 3 at 2nd level and ending at resistance 30 at 20th level.

Note: Place this feature on each of your Eldamon actors

Frozen (Deathly Chill).name: Frozen (Deathly Chill)
Frozen (Deathly Chill).description:
At the end of each of its turns, the target takes a number of d10s of damage equal to its current @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen} value (for instance, 5d10 at the end of its turn if it's currently frozen 5). This damage isn't persistent damage and can't be removed in the same way as persistent damage; instead, it lasts until the target is no longer frozen, at which point the effect ends.

@Damage[(@item.badge.value)d10[cold]]
